snippet: A father watches his son take up the battle to legalize marriage for gay and lesbian couples in California.
abstract: Dominick Zarrillo Modern Love column on his son's effort in the fight to legalize gay marriage in California shares his own emotions at watching his son's strength and patience in the face of those who would deny him the safety and sanctity of marrying the man he loves.
lead_paragraph: A father watches his son take up the battle to legalize marriage for gay and lesbian couples in California.
